body.p: The tagless editor comes with some predefined document types already configured when the application is installed on the computer. These document types describe well-known XML frameworks largely used today for authoring XML documents. Editing a document which conforms to one of these types is as easy as opening it or creating it from one of the predefined document templates which also come with .
To see our video demonstration about configuring a framework in , go to http://oxygenxml.com/demo/FrameworkConfiguration.html.
